name: Promotion Class: Icecaller
description:
Role: Healing

So versed in magic they can coalesce it into powerful healing and defensive creations.

Stat Adjustments:
Support Power +450
Increase Ice Storage Cap +1
Final Mitigations Cap +10%

Traits Granted:
Frostcaster Mastery
Mail Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Chill Out: Now also heals you and the lowest health member of your group, Cool Ice Weave now also heals and cannot be flipped.
Crystal Lance: Now heals the Icecaller for damage done.
Shatter Storm: Now has a chance to spawn Refreshing Ice on hit.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Icecaller promotion class and prevents access to the Archmage and Frostguard promotion classes.
